Reviews.Title: Ok as a motion dector, or outdoor mic...
Reviews.Author: W. Kaye
Reviews.Content: Very good price but very poor picture.  In my case I ended up with a Q-See QSC48030, no sound but I can clearly see what the area the camera is viewing.

Reviews.Title: Terrible image quality
Reviews.Author: Towsby
Reviews.Content: The image quality is terrible.  Even at noon on a sunny day the image is dark and blurry.  By mid-afternoon, you can only see the general outline of objects.  The "night vision" is basically non-existent.  I think the problem is that these are CMOS cameras.  Buy a CCD camera instead.

ProductInfo.Features:
380 TV Lines Resolution
6mm Lens
11 IR LEDs for Night Vision
Built-in Microphone for Audio
60 ft. Cable & Power Adapter Included
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QSOCWCPK Weatherproof Color CMOS Camera Kits with Night Vision (2- Pack)
